title: How to Find and Catch Largemouth Bass in Stardew Valley

steps.title: Largemouth Bass can be caught in the mountain lake, 6 AM to 7 PM, in all seasons.
steps.content: Largemouth Bass can be caught in the mountain lake, 6 AM to 7 PM, in all seasons. This fish is more likely to be caught the farther your bobber lands in the water. If you have the Wilderness Farm, you can catch this fish using your farm's lake. [1] X Research source Largemouth Bass may be found randomly in the Traveling Cart, in Garbage Cans, or gifted by Linus through the mail. You can use Magic Bait to catch Sunfish in any weather, time, and season.

steps.title: Largemouth Bass is used in a few quests.
steps.content: Largemouth Bass is used in a few quests. Most notably, you'll need a Largemouth Bass for Jodi once you reach 4 hearts. Other quests include requests at the "Help Wanted" board by Pierre's General Store and the Special Orders board outside of Lewis' house.

steps.title: Largemouth Bass can be gifted to villagers.
steps.content: Largemouth Bass can be gifted to villagers. Since no villagers love or like this gift, it's not recommended. However, you can give Largemouth Bass as a neutral gift to Demetrius, Elliott, Leo, Linus, Pam, Sebastian, and Willy.

steps.title: Use Largemouth Bass to cook recipes.
steps.content: Use Largemouth Bass to cook recipes. There are four cooking recipes total that can use Largemouth Bass: Crispy Bass Maki Roll Quality Fertilizer Sashimi

steps.title: Largemouth Bass can be used in a Fish Pond.
steps.content: Largemouth Bass can be used in a Fish Pond. The only output is green Largemouth Bass Roe.

steps.title: Use Largemouth Bass to make a Fishing Vest.
steps.content: Use Largemouth Bass to make a Fishing Vest. You can use the Sewing Machine in Emily's and Haley's house along with some Cloth . Largemouth Bass can also be used as a green dye.
